shorts.title: Victor Alfieri Society gives out scholarships
shorts.title_distilled: Victor Alfieri Society gives out scholarships.
shorts.description: The Victor Alfieri Society scholarship committee recently presented two West Scranton High School students each with $1,000 scholarships. From left: Gino Arcurie, Victor Alfieri Society vice president and committee chairman; Sam Tomaino, committee vice chairman; Ava Wallace, scholarship recipient; Gianna Fratzola, scholarship recipient; and Joe Spinelli, Victor Alfieri Society trustee and committee member.
shorts.content: The Victor Alfieri Society scholarship committee recently presented two West Scranton High School students each with $1,000 scholarships. From left: Gino Arcurie, Victor Alfieri Society vice president and committee chairman; Sam Tomaino, committee vice chairman; Ava Wallace, scholarship recipient; Gianna Fratzola, scholarship recipient; and Joe Spinelli, Victor Alfieri Society trustee and committee member.

shorts.title: ATHLETE OF THE WEEK: Ben Boyanoski, Scranton Prep golf
shorts.title_distilled: ATHLETE OF THE WEEK: Ben Boyanoski, Scranton Prep golf.
shorts.description: For the second consecutive year, Boyanoski won the individual title at the Bob Simons Classic. The Scranton Prep senior shot 2-under par over his final six holes to overcome a four-shot deficit and rally for the victory with an even-par 72 at Elkview Country Club. He also helped the Cavaliers take the team title and start 4-0 in Lackawanna League play. Boyanoski’s selection begins the 76th year of the Athlete of the Week program. Family: Father, Jeff; mother, Mandi; brother, Nate; sister, Anna. Coach: Christi Dorece. Talk about your comeback over the final six holes: I knew my game was […]
shorts.content: For the second consecutive year, Boyanoski won the individual title at the Bob Simons Classic. The Scranton Prep senior shot 2-under par over his final six holes to overcome a four-shot deficit and rally for the victory with an even-par 72 at Elkview Country Club. He also helped the Cavaliers take the team title and start 4-0 in Lackawanna League play. Boyanoski’s selection begins the 76th year of the Athlete of the Week program. Family: Father, Jeff; mother, Mandi; brother, Nate; sister, Anna. Coach: Christi Dorece. Talk about your comeback over the final six holes: I knew my game was […]
shorts.content_distilled: For the second consecutive year, Boyanoski won the individual title at the Bob Simons Classic.
